description:
A day at the beach turns into a treasure hunt, but when giant man-eating sharks make an appearance, the bikini-clad warrior babes get a chance to show off their moves!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Do Not Fight Unless It Is Critical
Kämpfe nur, wenn die Lage kritisch ist
On ne combat pas lorsqu`on n`est pas menacé
Walcz jedynie, gdy zmusi cię do tego sytuacja
危うきに非ざれば戦わず
